segments.text: Miss Green , do you have life insurance right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't . I don't have a family , so I don't think I need it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This year our company is offering a new plan especially for single people like you . I think you might be interested .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , but I've never thought about it before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's OK . I'll leave the pamphlet here . If you need more information , you can call me any time .
segments.speaker: S1
